玞字的基本解释

玞
fū
〔珷玞〕见“
珷”。

玞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
［《廣韻》甫無切，平虞，非。］
亦作“砆1”。
见“珷玞”。

玞字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玞； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页727第30
【廣韻】甫無切【集韻】【韻會】風無切【正韻】芳無切，?音膚。【廣韻】美石，次玉。同砆。【山海經】會稽之山，下多砆石。【註】郭璞曰：武砆，石似玉。今長沙臨湘縣出之，赤地白文，色蔥蘢不分了也。吳任臣曰：砆，水經注作玞。　又【集韻】通作夫。【前漢·董仲舒傳】猶武夫之與美玉。

玞字的起名意思

像玉的石块。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玞; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 727 30
[Guang Yun] Fu Wu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Feng Wu Qi [Zheng Yun] Fang Wu Qi, sound skin. [Guangyun] Beautiful stone, second jade. Same as 砆. [Shan Hai Jing] The mountains of Kuaiji, there are many rocks underneath. [Note] Guo Pu said: Wu Yan, stone is like jade. Today, it was born in Linxiang County, Changsha, and it was written in white on the ground, and the colors were verdant. Wu Renchen said: 砆, the water classic is annotated as 玞.　[Jiyun] Tong Zuohu. [Previous Han·Dong Zhongshu Biography] Yuwufuzhi and beautiful jade.
